name: Balara
description: The Balara is a Large undead creature characterized by its glowing ribcage and menacing structure. It instills fear through its presence, capable of both melee and ranged attacks.
memorable: Its ability to frighten foes with Terrifying Luminance and prevent them from healing makes it a menacing opponent.
goals: To instill fear in its enemies and dominate the battlefield through intimidation.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other undead, possibly serving under a more powerful creator or master.
environment: Typically found in dark, haunted, or desolate locations.
strengths: High hit points and the ability to incapacitate foes through fear and restrict their healing.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its effectiveness in social interactions.
attacks: Can perform multiattacks using a bite or claws, as well as necrotic bolt for ranged damage.
most_powerful_ability: Terrifying Luminance, which can frighten nearby enemies and immobilize them.
senses: Has keen perception with a passive score of 14, allowing it to effectively detect enemies.
skills: Average stealth capabilities with a score of 12, aiding in ambush tactics.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and conditions.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Can move swiftly to pursue foes without provoking opportunity attacks.
